go_data.justification: Myosins are motor proteins that convert chemical energy, ATP, to physical force to move actin filaments.
Myosins bind to actin filaments and move them.
Cytoplasmic streaming in plants is caused by myosin XI-bound organelle movement along actin filaments.
Myosins are involved in the movement of cellular components, such as vesicles, along actin filaments.
Myosins are associated with the cytoskeleton, specifically actin filaments.
